frontmatter.title: Reselect with Redux: A Use Case
frontmatter.spoiler: Reselect is a simple yet effective library in a sense it can cut down on computational and network intensive tasks. In case of Redux it can help achieve a derived value from existing reducers instead of creating a new reducer for holding a derived value or fetching it from server.

fields.slug: /Flow - It’s Not Just About Static Typing/

frontmatter.title: Flow: It’s Not Just About Static Typing
frontmatter.spoiler: Flow has become a well known type checker in the Javascript ecosystem but it’s advantages aren’t limited to type safety.
